name: Knight of the Living Dead (Nwhelden)
description:
The undead have risen! It’s time to unsheathe your sword and save the kingdom! Will you be able to defeat the oncoming onslaught? Or will the princess in peril?! 

Knight of the Living Dead is a 2D, top-down, survival game I created for a class project. Please check out the credits page to see the full list of artists whose assets I used to create this game!

Controls: WASD to move, LMB to attack. Highly recommend you use a mouse to aim. Esc will stop the game (NOT PAUSE).
